name: MDF: Magical Defense Force Demo
description:
A girl with strange magical powers blew into town one day, drawn by an unknown force. There she crosses paths with a local delinquent who wants nothing to do with her. Together, they find themselves battling an unknown evil organization, determined to steal energy from the unsuspecting townsfolk and rule the world. They are not alone, as there are five more magical girls who seem to be drawn to this town.

But there is a further unknown menace, that sleeps beneath their feet as well.

This demo contains the first 3 chapters of a 24 chapter project.

Each chapter takes roughly 30 minutes to read.

Feedback would be greatly appreciated.
